Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Cause/Adverse Event/Adverse Event by CTCAE Category/Adverse Event Associated with Sexual and Reproductive Function/Gynecomastia Adverse Event
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Breast Diseases/Gynecomastia
Record.BroaderTerm: Adverse Event Associated with Sexual and Reproductive Function
Record.Description: Excessive development of the breasts in males; usually the result of hormonal imbalance or treatment with certain drugs.
Enlargement of the BREAST in the males, caused by an excess of ESTROGENS. Physiological gynecomastia is normally observed in NEWBORNS; ADOLESCENT; and AGING males.
